text: Arturo Alessandri Besa (31 October 1923 â€“ 13 July 2022) was a Chilean lawyer and politician. Alessandri was member of his country's Chamber of Deputies in 1973 and also of the Senate from 1990 to 1998. He also was candidate for the presidency of Chile in the 1993 elections. He was the grandson of Arturo Alessandri Palma and the nephew of Jorge Alessandri, both presidents of Chile. He was born in Santiago, Chile. Alessandri Besa died on 13 July 2022 in Santiago at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chilean lawyers Category:Politicians from Santiago
title: Arturo Alessandri Besa
